Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

Hi Joel,

Fascinating topics!

Similarly, you might be able to formalize an aspect of an individual's
> experience in terms of entropy as well. For example, a curious agent might
> maximize the entropy of the distribution of behaviors it encounters during
> its lifetime.
>

I've also encountered some work about developmental robotics, curious
agents, playful agents, intrinsic motivations, skill building... I will
start a new thread so that people can list works that might be related to
novelty search and behavioral diversity.

Cheers,
Vassilis

--047d7b2e548acbc8eb04f8a7187f
